attributes.attribute: Stylish and practical, the Cosmopolitan is an ideal workstation for all exhibitions and displays. The workstation incorporates a unique Twist & Lock pole system to create an internal structure that strengthens the unit without the need for a tambour wrap. This allows graphic wraps to be applied directly, creating a cleaner more professional finish. As there is no need for tambour, the unit is also lighter and more portable.

Complete with wire kit to suspend rigid graphic substrates;Flat pack furniture constructed from composite materials and 25mm aluminium tube poles;Overall assembled dimensions: 1000mm (h) x 1000mm (w) x 450mm (d) approx; 550 micron graphic wrap recommended (not supplied);Full Wrap dimensions: 966mm (h) x 2340mm (w) approx;Graphic attached with loop fastener (see recommended accessories);PVC graphic strengthening strips supplied;Strong and durable;Approx 1/4 lighter than traditional tambour wrap units;Quick and easy to assemble, no tools required;<STRONG>Recommended Carry Bag</STRONG> <FONT color=#ff0000>AB176</FONT> <STRONG>Recommended Carry Case</STRONG> <FONT color=#ff0000>AC347A</FONT>;User instructions listed are generic, unit shown may differ
Modular
10 Year Guarantee

This allows graphic wraps to be applied directly, creating a cleaner more professional finish. As there is no need for tambour, the unit is also lighter and more portable.
